article_title: Government Has A New Year's Resolution For You

article_metadata.author: Jeffrey Dorfman

og.description: You might think that what you eat is your own business, but that was before you invited the government to pay your medical bills. Now that the government cares whether or not you are healthy, it wants you to eat healthy, or else.
og.title: Government Has A New Year's Resolution For You: Eat Healthy
